participant_1.background:
I love a good stew, coffee, and creating content for my YouTube channel.
I've always been close with my family, even though my brother has gotten into trouble.
I listen to my favorite music from my childhood.
i love to go horseback riding whenever i can.
i am a scientist.

participant_2.background:
I grew up with my parents and siblings.
i keep my hair cut very short.
I prefer to listen to my own music on my own terms.
i have recently started working as a freelance designer.
My favorite TV shows are usually medical dramas or comedies, because they're relatable to my job and help me relax.

content.text: What do you like to do in your free time?
I like to watch TV, go out with friends, and work on my hobbies.
I like to read, paint, and play video games.
I like to read and paint too! What are some of your favorite books?
I like to read a lot of different genres, but my favorites are mystery and suspense novels.
I love those too! I also like to read historical fiction.
I've never really gotten into historical fiction, but I've heard good things about it.
You should give it a try! There are some really great books out there.
I'll have to check it out. What are some of your favorite historical fiction books?
I like the Outlander series by Diana Gabaldon and the Pillars of the Earth series by Ken Follett.
I've heard good things about Outlander, but I've never read it. I'll have to check it out.
I definitely recommend it. It's a great series.
Thanks for the recommendation! I'll check it out.
